scripts.dev: wrangler dev --test-scheduled --remote=false --live-reload --env=dev --var TG_BOT_TOKEN:$(grep TG_BOT_TOKEN .env | cut -d '=' -f2) --var GOOGLE_API_CLIENT_SECRET:$(grep GOOGLE_API_CLIENT_SECRET .env | cut -d '=' -f2)
scripts.expose: curl https://api.telegram.org/bot$(grep TG_BOT_TOKEN .env | cut -d '=' -f2)/setWebhook?url=https://$(curl -s http://localhost:55555/quicktunnel | jq -r '.hostname')/
